definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Suddenly, I was tumbled, fell on the ground, but without any pain. I scrabbled to get up, and kept running.
sentences.chinese: 忽地絆了一跤，撲了一下倒在地上，卻也不覺得疼。

sentences.english: So, the deer suddenly jumped in front of a brown car.
sentences.chinese: 所以，小鹿忽地跳到了褐色的車前面。

sentences.english: There was a mist in front of my eyes, and suddenly burning tears ran down my face.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼前一片模糊，忽地，眼淚順着臉頰往下流。

sentences.english: I ducked when I saw the rock falling.
sentences.chinese: 當我看見石頭落下時我忽地低下頭。

sentences.english: Run approximately, the woods inside suddenly spreads to wail because assist of voice.
sentences.chinese: 行走間，密林裏忽地傳出呼救的聲音。

sentences.english: Recall those rain wets the events of the past, suddenly found already dusk.
sentences.chinese: 追憶那些被秋雨打溼的往事，忽地發現人已黃昏。

definition: wide and open/a flash of understanding
to be just about to/to be on the point of
